title: About Me
subtitle: Learn about my story and skills
intro: I am a passionate full-stack engineer focused on creating high-quality, user-friendly digital products. With over 5 years of software development experience, I specialize in building modern web applications and mobile solutions. I love learning new technologies and applying them to solve complex problems and create exceptional user experiences. Beyond programming, I am a technical blogger, active open-source contributor, and enjoy mentoring the next generation of developers.

downloadResume.title: Want to know more?
downloadResume.description: Download my complete resume to learn about my detailed work history, project achievements, and technical capabilities.
